CustomField.description: If this action fails, this flag controls the agent's next step. If checked, the agent will stop and report the failure to the user. If unchecked (default), the agent will receive the error as context and attempt to recover autonomously (e.g., by using a different tool).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If an error occurs: Checked = Stop and tell the user. Unchecked = Allow the AI to see the error and try to recover autonomously (e.g., by using a different tool).
CustomField.label: Halt And Report Error
